main.name: Shalin Patel
main.description: Enthusiastic Mathematics student with lots of passion and experience in the computer science realm. Excellent programming skills in multiple languages and a strong background in how to work as a team with admirable communication skills.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.company: Ontario Ministry of Government and Consumer Services
work.title: Infrastructure Technologies Services Co-op
work.description1: • Worked with IBM’s Privileged Identity Manager to handle access management for the secure data servers at the Data Center Operations sector in MGCS.
work.description2: • Designed an algorithm and developed a GUI to successfully automate the process of user modifications in PIM achieving significantly reduced man-hours and a consistent workflow with less chance of human error.
work.description3: • Optimized SQL queries in SSMS sent through PowerBI reports achieving a 7-fold decrease in time.

project.title: MongoDB | Express.js | React.js | Node.js | JavaScript | HTML5 | CSS3
project.description1: • A full stack MERN web application with a Material UI appearance.
project.description2: • It allows the user to register/login and store their multiple online credentials and safely logout.
project.description3: • Incorporated CRUD functionality, the use of React hooks, context and JWT authentication.

project.title: Django | Python | JavaScript | HTML5 | CSS3
project.description1: • Innovated a Facebook-type application directed towards youth with a space-theme.
project.description2: • Focused on making an elegant, user-friendly interface by using Django for CRUD functionality.
project.description3: • Uploaded on pythonanywhere.com, capturing a web traffic of 674 within the first two months.

project.title: Python | Tableau | Pandas | MatPlotLib | Scikit-Learn | Tensorflow
project.description1: • Program that successfully differentiates between pictures of cats and dogs with an 86% accuracy.
project.description2: • Inspired by reCAPTCHA when signing up for a website to recreate a similar algorithm with animals.
project.description3: • • Created a Tableau worksheet to visualize the results and further improve the accuracy to 88%.

skills.name: Python, C, C++, JavaScript, Bash, HTML5, CSS3, Git, Tableau
